org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections

Class RTOutputBamArgumentCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections.RTOutputArgumentCollection
      • org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections.RTOutputBamArgumentCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class RTOutputBamArgumentCollection
extends RTOutputArgumentCollection
    Simple output argument collection for output SAM/BAM/CRAM files, without splitting.
    See Also:

      • createWriter

        protected org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKReadWriter createWriter(ReadWriterFactory factory,
                                                                               htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader header,
                                                                               boolean presorted)
        Checks if the output name is a SAM/BAM/CRAM file and if so it creates a SAM writer. Otherwise, it thrown an UserException.
        Specified by:
        createWriter in class RTOutputArgumentCollection
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to use for get the output writer.
        header - the header for the output file (already updated).
        presorted - if true, the output is assumed to be pre-sorted.
